title: Karma and Reincarnation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/8/19
itunes:title: Karma and Reincarnation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/8/19
description:
George Noory and paranormal researcher Susan Masino explore her findings on reincarnation and the afterlife, and recounts her own son's memories of dying onboard the Titanic in a past life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
